sentences.sentence: Many politicians are trying to ingratiate themselves with her.
sentences.translation: 很多政客都在试图讨她的欢心。

sentences.sentence: The first part of his plan was to ingratiate himself with the members of the committee.
sentences.translation: 他的计划的第一步是拉拢委员会的成员。

sentences.sentence: He did his best to ingratiate himself with the royal family.
